snippet: An Orlando woman has told investigators that she was groped as a child by a young George Zimmerman, who is charged with second-degree murder in the death of Trayvon Martin.
abstract: Orlando woman in her mid-20s tells investigators that she was groped as a child by a young George Zimmerman, who is charged with second-degree murder in the death of Trayvon Martin; Zimmerman's lawyer dismisses allegations as irrelevant and argues that statement should have been withheld from the public since it could lead to widespread hostile publicity and taint Zimmerman's right to a fair trial.
lead_paragraph: An Orlando woman has told investigators that she was groped as a child by a young George Zimmerman, who is charged with second-degree murder in the death of Trayvon Martin.

headline.seo: Woman Says Trayvon Martin’s Killer Groped Her as a Child
headline.main: Woman Tells of Encounters With Killer in Martin Case
headline.print_headline: Woman Tells of Encounters With Killer in Martin Case
